price: (Rasûlüm!) Senin hakkında bak ne biçim temsiller getirdiler! Artık onlar sapmışlardır ve (hidayete) hiçbir yol da bulamazlar.
arabic: ٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ ضَرَبُواْ لَكَ ٱلۡأَمۡثَٰلَ فَضَلُّواْ فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ سَبِيلٗا

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: unẓur kayfa ḍarabū laka al-amthāla faḍallū falā yastaṭīʿūna sabīlan
